tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE risk_parameters (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    risk_limit FLOAT NOT NULL,
    max_exposure FLOAT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE risk_parameters (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  max_loss DECIMAL,
  max_exposure DECIMAL,
  risk_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE execution_limits (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  max_orders_per_sec INT,
  max_order_size DECIMAL,
  time_window INTERVAL
);

CREATE TABLE risk_strategy_mapping (
    map_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    parameter_id INT NOT NULL,
    strategy_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (parameter_id) REFERENCES risk_parameters(parameter_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (strategy_id) REFERENCES algorithmic_strategies(strategy_id)
);
